title: Reconcile Home Medications
description: A nurse is admitting a new patient and needs to reconcile the medications the patient takes at home with the medications being ordered in the hospital.

tasks.description: Interview the patient to get a list of their home medications, dosages, and frequencies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse documents the patient-reported home medication list.

tasks.description: Open the admission medication reconciliation tool, which displays the home meds side-by-side with new inpatient orders.
For each home medication, decide whether to 'Continue', 'Discontinue', or 'Modify' it for the inpatient stay, and complete the reconciliation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse and provider complete the reconciliation, ensuring medication safety at a critical transition of care.
